about_the_game:
Step into the dark and enigmatic world of "It's All Connected," a spine-tingling indie horror-puzzle game that promises to take you on a terrifying journey like no other. As a new recruit at CompSec, a secretive company dedicated to documenting and eliminating otherworldly "Anomalies," you will grapple with the unknown and confront the hidden horrors lurking beneath the surface.

In this gripping game, you'll find yourself entangled in a web of rich lore, immersing yourself in a story that goes far beyond the typical spot-the-difference gameplay. Each anomaly you encounter is a piece of a larger, mysterious puzzle, and your job is to piece it together while battling heart-pounding jump scares and enduring psychological horror.

Unveil the secrets that have plagued CompSec for years and decipher the origins of these chilling anomalies. But beware – you're not alone, and the darkness that envelops you holds more than just the secrets of the company. The lines between reality and nightmare blur as you venture deeper into the unknown.

With stunning 3D realism, "It's All Connected" places you in an intensely suspenseful and mysterious atmosphere where every shadow conceals a sinister secret. Are you prepared to face your deepest fears and uncover the connections that bind it all together?

This game is designed for horror enthusiasts who crave an experience that challenges both their wits and their courage. "It's All Connected" is not just a game; it's a descent into the darkest recesses of the human psyche.

Dive into the darkness, unravel the mysteries, and remember – in this sinister world, it's all connected.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains corpses, weapons and the like to tell a story.

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 6G/ AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 12gb / AMD Radeon RX 5700
